title: filecache database error
body:
just got an error page out of the blue with this:
```
an exception occurred while executing 'delete from "oc_filecache" where "fileid" = ?': sqlstate[hy000]: general error: 5 database is locked
#0 /home/user/owncloud/3rdparty/doctrine/dbal/lib/doctrine/dbal/statement.php(140): doctrine\dbal\dbalexception::driverexceptionduringquery(object(pdoexception), 'delete from "oc...', array)
#1 /home/user/owncloud/lib/db/statementwrapper.php(70): doctrine\dbal\statement->execute(array)
#2 /home/user/owncloud/lib/db.php(276): oc_db_statementwrapper->execute(array)
#3 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/cache/cache.php(340): oc_db::executeaudited('delete from `*p...', array)
#4 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/cache/scanner.php(183): oc\files\cache\cache->remove('empty')
#5 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/cache/scanner.php(134): oc\files\cache\scanner->scanchildren(false, false, 3)
#6 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/cache/watcher.php(48): oc\files\cache\scanner->scan(false, false)
#7 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/view.php(822): oc\files\cache\watcher->checkupdate(false)
#8 /home/user/owncloud/lib/files/filesystem.php(734): oc\files\view->getdirectorycontent('/dropbox', '')
#9 /home/user/owncloud/apps/files/index.php(61): oc\files\filesystem::getdirectorycontent('/dropbox')
#10 /home/user/owncloud/lib/base.php(675): require_once('/home/user/ownc...')
#11 [internal function]: oc::loadappscriptfile(array)
#12 /home/user/owncloud/lib/router.php(127): call_user_func(array, array)
#13 /home/user/owncloud/lib/base.php(604): oc_router->match('/apps/files')
#14 /home/user/owncloud/index.php(30): oc::handlerequest()
#15 {main}
```

no apache errors, nothing in the console. whatâ€™s up with this @bartv2 @icewind1991?
